search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Robly (robly.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Robly can be found here: [https://support.robly.com/pricing/](https://support.robly.com/pricing/)【3:1†source】.

extracted_content.content:
### [What forms of payment does Robly accept?](https://support.robly.com/forms-of-payment/)

Subscription payments can be made using a valid credit card. Robly does not accept any other form of payment.

### [Am I billed for Unsubscribed contacts?](https://support.robly.com/am-i-billed-for-unsubscribed-contacts/)

Nope! You are not charged for unsubscribed contacts. We use the Entire Contact list to determine how many active contacts you are billed for. We bill you for active contacts stored or sent to, whichever is greater.

### [Yearly Contract Buyout – How It Works](https://support.robly.com/yearly-contract-buyout-how-it-works/)

Robly will buy you out of your yearly contract at another provider. We will give you Robly FREE for the amount of TIME (not money) that you have left in your yearly contract. Example 1 – 11 months left – $15/mo Robly plan: You have 11 months left in your yearly

### [How much does OpenGen cost?](https://support.robly.com/how-much-does-opengen-cost/)

Nothing! It’s included with your Robly subscription. 🙂

### [Where do I enter or edit my credit card information?](https://support.robly.com/where-do-i-enter-my-credit-card-information/)

If you do not see a “Buy Now” button on your email dashboard, click My Account \> Settings \> Subscription \> Buy Now. To enter your credit card information, click Add Credit Card. If you want to edit existing credit card information, click Edit Credit Card. We use a service called

### [How much does Robly cost?](https://support.robly.com/how-much-does-robly-cost/)

Click here to see our pricing. Robly only accepts credit cards, and either bills monthly or yearly, depending on your subscription type. We give a 15% discount for paying a year up front, and a 15% discount for non-profits.

### [Does Robly have a discount for non-profits?](https://support.robly.com/does-robly-have-a-discount-for-non-profits/)

Yes. Robly has a 15% discount off of monthly or yearly plans for non-profits. To see pricing, click here.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Robly offers a 15% discount for annual payments and for non-profits. Pricing is based on the number of active contacts.

promotional_offers.offer_description: 15% discount for non-profits on monthly or yearly plans.
15% discount for paying a year upfront.
